experience.title: MID ERP Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Conducted Frappe/ERPNext, Python, and JavaScript training, mentoring team members to enhance technical skills.
Upgraded Frappe/ERPNext from v13 to v15, separating and optimizing a built-in Vue.js application.
Created a customizable Kanban board and resolved complex related issues.
Managed environments for UAT, QA, Preproduction, and Outsourcing pipelines.
Built the Frappe Developer Toolbox, increasing development efficiency.
Built the Single View Connector, a seperate FLASK app to connect with various banking services and else.

experience.title: ERP Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Built custom Doctypes and modules with related reports and functionalities, including HR, appointment bookings, accounting, and procedural enhancements.
Developed a Revenue Sharing Module to automate distribution of revenue via invoices for healthcare practitioners.
Created custom APIs and integrated the ERP system with external healthcare systems like Medical.
Oversaw ticket distribution and managed weekly updates/releases, including code reviews and merge requests.
Enhanced system scalability and reliability through cloud integrations and optimized configurations.

experience.title: System Development Officer
responsibilities: Created and maintained web forms for quality evaluations and call logging, serving ~40 clients.
Developed internal systems such as ECT (employee announcements), online/English assessments, Extensya's chat tool, and live agent help desk.
Built custom APIs, including data retrieval from Zendesk and exporting data to Excel sheets (CSV/XLS).
Developed a digital library with a file manager for upload/delete operations and a tree-view structure for file browsing.
Streamlined company workflows by creating tools and scripts for editing, debugging, and testing internal systems.

testimonials.text: I highly recommend Munes as a talented and dedicated programmer. His proficiency in programming languages is commendable, and he excels in problem-solving. During our time as colleagues, Munes consistently demonstrated his expertise in coding and was a valuable asset to the team. Notably, Munes played a crucial role in assisting me during our training period. His willingness to share knowledge and provide support greatly contributed to my learning experience. I have witnessed firsthand his exceptional problem-solving skills and creative approach to programming challenges. Munes's commitment to excellence and collaborative spirit make him an outstanding team member. I am confident that his skills and positive attitude will continue to make significant contributions wherever he goes.
testimonials.name: Ahmad Okasha
testimonials.title: Software Engineer at Nixpend

testimonials.text: I am delighted to recommend Munis Fawaz as a software engineer. I had the pleasure of training Munis at Nixpend Sequential Technologies. His ability to grasp knowledge quickly and his innovative problem-solving skills make him a standout candidate. He is not the type of guy to complain when he faces a problem, rather he focuses on how to approach the problem and break it down. He is initiative, when discovers something to automate or a code to optimize he immediately raises the flag and takes the lead to handle it. He's got a beautiful sense of humor which is amazing to have especially in a stressful environment.

testimonials.text: I recommend Munes as a Full Stack Engineer. He possesses strong technical skills, consistently solving complex problems efficiently. One of the unique things about Munes is that he proposes improvements to the system, and is not just someone who carries out instructions.

testimonials.text: I am writing to highly recommend my esteemed colleague, Munes Bani Fawaz, for any professional opportunity that he may pursue in the future. As a Senior Software Engineer, Munes has consistently demonstrated an extraordinary level of skill, dedication, and innovation in his work, earning him the affectionate moniker of "Mr. Automator" amongst our team. Munes's remarkable abilities in the field of software engineering have had a profound impact on our team and the projects we have undertaken. One of Munes's most outstanding qualities is his incredible proficiency in automating complex and time-consuming tasks. He has a unique talent for simplifying and optimizing workflows, making our daily work more efficient and less error-prone. The improvements he has made through automation have not only saved us countless hours but have also significantly reduced the margin for human error, improving the overall quality of our work. Munes is not just an automation wizard; he is also an exceptional problem solver. He possesses a keen analytical mind, which enables him to dissect complex issues and devise elegant solutions. His ability to approach challenges with creativity and logical thinking is a testament to his problem-solving prowess. Whenever our team has faced roadblocks, Munes has been the go-to person to find innovative solutions and guide us back on track. Munes's dedication to his work is unwavering. He consistently goes above and beyond to meet project deadlines and deliver high-quality results. His ability to adapt to new technologies and stay up-to-date with industry trends showcases his commitment to continuous learning and growth. His collaborative and communicative nature makes him an invaluable asset to our team, as he readily shares his knowledge and supports his colleagues.
testimonials.name: Moneeb Shammout
testimonials.title: Backend Engineer | Software Engineer

testimonials.text: Professional, team player & passionate about what he does! It was a privilege to work with Munes.

testimonials.text: I am writing to recommend Munes based on his exceptional performance during his tenure at Extensya under my guidance. Munes exhibited an impressive ability to rapidly grasp complex concepts and swiftly apply them to tasks. His remarkable aptitude for learning was evident as he consistently displayed a deep understanding of the projects he was involved in. Moreover, his organizational skills were remarkable, allowing him to handle multiple tasks efficiently and effectively. Munes's exceptional efficiency and dedication to meeting deadlines while maintaining a high standard of work made him a key contributor to our team's success. His resourcefulness, creative approach to problem-solving, and willingness to take initiative greatly contributed to the innovative solutions we were able to implement. Overall, Munes demonstrated intelligence, resourcefulness, and an exceptional work ethic, and his positive attitude and eagerness to learn served as an inspiration to his peers. I wholeheartedly recommend Munes for any role where his technical skills, adaptability, and dedication would be valued.
testimonials.name: Fadia Elmabrouk

testimonials.text: It is my pleasure to strongly recommend Munes Bani Fawaz for a position as a Systems Development Officer. I am Murad Fares, a Systems Development Manager at Extensya, and with my 15 years of experience in software development, I have encountered many young professionals, but Munes stands out. During our time working together, Munes displayed great talents in technical applications and programming languages, including PHP, SQL DB, CSS, CMS, JavaScript, and various data visualization tools. I am confident that Munes would be a valuable asset to your company. He not only possesses the skills and experience you're seeking, but he will also contribute significantly and help your company grow.
testimonials.name: Murad Fares
testimonials.title: Systems Development Manager | Extensya

items.title: Jordan Prayer Times
items.shortDescription: Get accurate prayer times in Jordan with notifications.
items.description: Jordan Prayer Times is a comprehensive and easy-to-use app that helps you stay on track with your daily prayers. Whether you're at home, at work, or on the go, this app provides accurate prayer times based on your location in Jordan and allows you to have notifications to suit your preferences.

items.title: Cubic Maze Runner
items.shortDescription: Game Inspired By Subway And Piano Tiles
items.description: Cubic Maze Runner is an exciting game inspired by the fast-paced action of Subway Surfers and the rhythm-based gameplay of Piano Tiles. In this game, players navigate through challenging levels while tapping to the beat of the music, avoiding obstacles, and scoring high points. With a smooth, addictive gameplay experience, this game will keep you engaged for hours as you aim to beat your best score.

items.title: I Love You â™¥â™¥â™¥
items.shortDescription: A heartfelt interactive webpage featuring song lyrics with a typewriter effect.
items.description: This project is a visually appealing and interactive webpage that displays song lyrics in a typewriter effect, inspired by the song 'All of Me' by John Legend. The page includes a heart-like button that, when clicked, starts the animation of the song lyrics and plays the music. The background and button transition between grayscale and normal modes to create a visually dynamic experience. The project is designed to evoke emotions through its heartwarming theme and smooth animations.

items.title: Coming Soon Template
items.shortDescription: A responsive website template for a 'Coming Soon' page
items.description: This 'Coming Soon' template is designed to showcase a website that is currently under construction. Featuring an engaging and smooth animation, it provides visitors with an exciting preview of what's to come. The layout is fully responsive, ensuring a seamless experience on all devices, from desktops to smartphones. Perfect for businesses or personal projects, this template sets the tone for what's next while keeping your audience engaged and informed about the upcoming launch.

items.title: Python Fundamentals
items.shortDescription: Learn the basics of Python: setup, data types, control flow, functions, and OOP.
items.description: This presentation will cover the basics of Python programming, from setting up your environment to exploring essential concepts and techniques. We will delve into data types, control flow, functions, modules and object-oriented programming, equipping you with the foundational knowledge necessary for effective Python development. Let's embark on this journey together!

items.title: Python Advanced Automation Class
items.shortDescription: Master advanced Python automation: log monitoring, email alerts, web scraping, and task scheduling.
items.description: This session dives into advanced Python automation, equipping you with the skills to handle real-world tasks efficiently. You'll implement a log monitoring system that detects critical errors in real-time and triggers email alerts. Additionally, you'll automate web scraping to extract and store structured data, using BeautifulSoup or Scrapy. With cross-platform compatibility and scheduling techniques, this lecture ensures your scripts run seamlessly on both Windows and Ubuntu. Get ready to elevate your automation skills! ðŸš€

items.title: Point of Sale Client Demo
items.description: Experience the future of shopping with a smart Point of Sale (POS) demo inspired by Amazon Go. This cutting-edge system uses barcode scanning to enable a seamless, checkout-free shopping experience. Customers can simply enter, pick up their desired items, and leaveâ€”no lines, no waiting. Payments are handled automatically through the POS device, delivering unmatched convenience and efficiency. Ideal for busy individuals who prioritize their time and prefer hassle-free shopping!

items.title: Frappe Kanban Demo
items.description: A customizable Kanban board is a dynamic and versatile tool designed to streamline workflows, enhance collaboration, and adapt to the unique needs of any team or project. Its advanced flexibility allows for tailoring columns, fields, labels, and filters while integrating features like custom JavaScript buttons for real-time actions and a fully dynamic settings interface. This means users can modify workflows, add or remove buttons, and configure board behavior without reloading, creating a seamless and intuitive experience. The board also includes a powerful modal system, allowing users to click on a card and instantly access detailed information or edit data directly, reducing downtime and improving task management efficiency. With role-based access control, progress tracking, and integrations with other tools (e.g., calendars or analytics), it ensures every team member has the exact tools and information they need. Custom color coding, drag-and-drop prioritization, and detailed comments with file attachments help centralize communication and reduce fragmented processes. Whether managing agile development sprints, marketing campaigns, or personal goals, this Kanban board empowers teams with unparalleled customization, boosting productivity and enabling smarter, more agile decision-making.

items.title: Frappe DocGenerator Demo
items.shortDescription: A better Document Generator / Template Engine
items.description: The DocGenerator feature, inspired by Docmosis, is a document generation tool designed specifically for ERP systems. It enables the dynamic creation of documents based on pre-defined Word templates, supporting both English and Arabic content. The templates preserve all formatting, including colors, fonts, and styles, ensuring that the final output maintains a professional and consistent appearance. The system also allows for the application of filters based on the document's data, prevents duplicate document creation by checking for existing files, and offers a preview option for generated documents in PDF format. After generating the document, it can be converted into a PDF, with an option to exclude specific pages, and uploaded to an S3 bucket for secure storage. This automated process efficiently handles document creation, management, and storage, offering a seamless solution for ERP systems to generate formatted documents from scratch.

items.title: Single View Connector
items.shortDescription: A unified interface for various services
items.description: SingleViewConnector is a Flask application that connects various services into a single view, providing a unified interface for users. This application enhances productivity by allowing users to access multiple services seamlessly from one platform. With features like customizable dashboards, user management, and service integration, it empowers teams to streamline their workflows and improve collaboration. The application is designed with a focus on user experience, ensuring that all functionalities are easily accessible and intuitive. Whether managing service consumers or monitoring system logs, SingleViewConnector offers a comprehensive solution for modern service management.
